title: Re-login and preserve form data
preconditions: User is logged in and has filled out a form on the last visited page.
steps:
1. Wait for session to expire.
2. Attempt to navigate to the last visited page.
3. Click on the login button.
4. Enter valid credentials and submit.
5. Observe the last visited page.
expected: User is redirected to the last visited page with the previously entered form data still populated.
